TopicTitle: Can't attach control surfaces to wings

Articles.Content: Can anyone help, i can\'t atach the two surfaces together they wont click in place at all, I have even tried downloading a plane and taking off then re attaching and it wont happen.

You need to use the WSADQE keys to rotate the part into the proper position for it to attach. Use with the Shift key for fine adjustments.

Cheers!
